attributes.action: Ban the pesticides causing colony collapse disorder within UK bees.
attributes.background: The UK bee population is still in decline which is partially due to colony collapse disorder. This disorder is due to multiple factors, one prevalent factor being the use of certain pesticides (specifically neonicotinoids). Please support this petition if you want the bee population to rise.

rejection.details:
The Government already supports further restrictions on neonicotinoids, so we're not sure exactly what action you'd like to see.

You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/environment-secretary-backs-further-restrictions-on-neonicotinoid-pesticides

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
